title: Investigation of the High Energy Behaviours of the Scalar Particle Scattering Amplitude in the Gravitational Field by Functional Approach
abstract: Closed expressions for the Green function and amplitude of the scalar particle scattering in the external gravitational field $g_{\mu\nu}(x)$ are found in the form of functional integrals. It is shown that, as compared with the scattering on the vector potential, the tensor character of the gravitational field leads to a more rapid increase of the cross section with increasing energy. Discrete energy levels of particles are obtained in the Newton potential.
